name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Vibrant Blend of Genres and Talent**  

Rock Werchter 2026 brings together 29 diverse artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of genres. Indie and alternative rock dominate the lineup, with six and five acts, respectively, while electronic, pop, and other niche genres like dream pop, soul, and folk rock add depth and variety. The festival also includes two DJs, ensuring an energetic mix of live performances and electronic beats. With every artist boasting a Spotify presence, attendees can easily explore the full lineup before the event.  

The lineup reflects strong international representation, with 12 acts from the USA and 11 from the UK, alongside talent from Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia. Gender diversity, while present, remains an area for growth, with 22 male-led acts compared to three female-fronted performances, one non-binary act, and two mixed-gender groups. Representation of people of color is limited, with just two acts featuring POC artists, highlighting an opportunity for increased inclusivity in future editions.  

With a solid average rating of 7.62 and nearly half of the acts scoring 8 or higher, Rock Werchter 2026 promises a high-quality experience. The festivalâ€™s ability to blend established names with emerging talent across a variety of genres ensures an exciting and eclectic atmosphere for music lovers of all tastes.
